member.name: F:Zebble.Grid`2.LazyLoadEnded
member.summary: This event will be fired when all datasource items are rendered and added to the grid.

member.name: M:Zebble.Grid`2.LazyLoadMore
member.summary: Returns whether it successfully added one.

member.name: M:Zebble.Grid.EnsureFullColumns
member.summary: If the number of items in the last row is less than the columns, it adds empty canvas cells to fill it up. This is useful for when you want to benefit from the automatic width allocation.
